title: Email
creator: chiefjohn1
content: Need help with TB for Android. Downloaded the app; used QR code to transfer data. Everything transfered quickly. However, I cannot receive email. Can't find any general settings that address this issue. Have used TB (Beta) on my laptop for quite awhile and have no problems with it.

content: The send section on Thunderbird has disappeared and so I am now unable to send emails, what have I done and can you please assist?

title: Can't install Thunderbird on my new mobile phone
creator: uffe5
content: Hello, I can't install - or rather trnsfer - Thunderbird to my new mobile phone despite it works allright on my Laptop. Can you possibly help me? Regards Uffe Nellemose uffe@nellemose.eu

title: certificat
creator: ken.gus
content: CertPathValidatorException: Trust ancor for certification path not found. This is the error message on my android11 phone. certifikatfel för ken... Kontrollera dina serverinställningar. in native language is the second error message. What am I to do about it?
